short.ar: منع الاعلانات على الجانب الأيمن من شاشة الكمبيوتر عند استعمل بريد ياهو وهوتميل وجوجل و يسع المساحة لبريدك الألكتروني
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Block ads on the right side of the screen when using Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail and Outlook.com which expand your message space
short.de: Blockier die Werbebanner Bildschirmhälfte bei Gmail, Outlook.com, Hotmail und Yahoo Mail und vergrössere so Deinen Online-Speicher
short.es,es_419: Bloquea los molestos anuncios cuando usas Gmail, Outlook.com, Hotmail y Yahoo Mail dándote mas espacio para el mensaje
short.fr: Supprime les annonces lors de l'utilisation de Gmail, Outlook.com, Hotmail et Yahoo Mail et ainsi élargir l'espace de vos messages
short.ja: 画面により空間あなたのメッセージを拡大Yahooメール、HotmailやGmailを使用しての右側に広告をブロック
short.pt_BR: Blocos de anúncios irritantes quando você usa o Gmail, Outlook.com, Hotmail e Yahoo Mail e dando-lhe mais espaço para a mensagem
short.ru: Блокирует рекламу с правой стороны экрана при использовании Yahoo Mail,Hotmail и Gmail тем самым расширяя ваше рабочее пространство
short.zh_CN: 在屏幕上时，使用雅虎邮件，Hotmail和Gmail的空间，从而扩大您的消息右边座广告

long.ar:
ينزع البرمجيات الاعلانات والروابط التي ترعاها و ينزع المساحة الفارغة التي خلفها الحاجزون الإعلانية الأخرى و يسع مساحتك لكتابة  البريد الإلكتروني

أيضا هناك الخيارات لإخفاء عناصر أخرى على برامج البريد الالكتروني لتقليص ألفوضى.  بالإضافة هناك الخيار لتركيز
على نهاية الأسبوع أو اليوم الحالي في  تقويمك جوجل

Click "Website" or visit jasonsavard.com for more info.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Removes ads and sponsored links leaving more space to focus on emails.

Great for parental control to child proof those ads.

Trusted developer of many extensions

Click "Website" or visit jasonsavard.com for more info.

Changelog: https://jasonsavard.com/wiki/Webmail_Ad_Blocker_changelog
long.de,es:
Removes the ads and sponsored links and squeezes out the empty space left behind by other ad blockers to give you more room to write your messages.

There are also options to hide various other items on your pages to make it more zen.

Click "Website" or visit jasonsavard.com for more info.

Changelog: https://jasonsavard.com/wiki/Webmail_Ad_Blocker_changelog
long.es_419:
Removes the ads and sponsored links and squeezes out the empty space left behind by other ad blockers to give you more room to write your messages.

For Gmail users: You can choose to remove the People Widget in the options.

Great for parental control to child proof those ads. There are also options to hide various other items on your Google Mail page to make it more zen.

Try my other popular apps http://jasonsavard.com

Now works with Outlook website also.

Changelog:
3.3.1 (Feb 23) - Remove setUninstallUrl error
3.3 (Jan 7 - 100% - Dec 24 5%) - Remove tops ads and right side ads in comfortable view
3.2.8 (Dec 18) - Added uninstall survey
3.2.7 (Dec 15) - Fixed width issue in Yahoo on large screens
3.2.6 (Nov 7) - Pushed right arrow to the left in Yahoo at&t
3.2.5 (Oct 17) - Removed chrome.extensions.getURL
3.2.4 (Oct 15) - Renamed chrome.runtime
3.2.2 (Sep 12) - Added Outlook to descriptions
3.2.1 - Added GA to Mac/Linux
3.2 - Added onerror logs
3.1 - Removed some errors in the logs
3.0 - Using event page to save memory
2.34 - Fixed issue with right side again :) in Outlook.com (It's new, so there changing it a lot :)
2.33 - Fixed issue with empty right side in Outlook.com
2.31 - Now blocking Outlook.com ads also
2.29 - Fixed 48px icon to make it larger
2.28 - Removed link at the top for Webmail Ad Blocker
2.25 - Gmail: Remove ad below email body
2.23 - Re-hiding people widget in new Gmail look
2.21 - Hiding more ads in Yahoo Mail, above and to the left of the inbox
2.19 - Detect email
2.18 - Updated donation payment system
2.17 - Fixed issue with CC/BCC in Chrome Dev
2.14 - Removed ads below email in Gmail
2.13.1 - Fixed issues with Macs
2.12 Now works with Preivew Pane
-Fixed empty email address in Gmail
2.10 - Fixed issue that caused slow down with Yahoo Mail in Linux Ubuntu
2.7 - Remove small ad in Hotmail at bottom left
2.6.1 - Option to hide new Gmail footer
2.6 - Re-removed ads below email message
2.5 - Added option to remove the Gmail's People Widget in the extension's options
2.4.9 - Temporarily disabled the "Move action/sidebar links" in the options to play nicely with Gmail's new people widget
2.4.8 - Removed space left behind in new Yahoo Mail with all views, including Page-by-Page view
2.4.7 - Fixed issue with contacts display in Chrome dev
2.3.1 - Bug fix: Link at top now on 1 line instead of 2
2.3 - My second attempt of removing the ads below the email body in Gmail
long.fr:
Supprime les annonces et élargit l'espace vide laissé par d'autres bloqueurs de publicité pour vous donner plus d'espace pour écrire vos messages.

Il existe également des options pour cacher les autres articles sur vos pages pour le rendre plus zen.

Cliquez sur « Site Web » ou visitez jasonsavard.com pour plus d'informations.
long.ja,pt_BR:
Removes the ads and sponsored links and squeezes out the empty space left behind by other ad blockers to give you more room to write your messages.

There are also options to hide various other items on your pages to make it more zen.

Try my other popular apps http://jasonsavard.com
Help or support go to http://jasonsavard.com/faq
long.ru:
Удаляет рекламу и сайты спонсоров, а также сжимает пустое пространство, оставленное другими Анти-Рекламными дополнениями, чтобы предоставить вам больше места для переписки.
 
Также имеется возможность спрятать различные другие объекты на вашей странице, чтобы сделать её чище.
 
Click "Website" or visit jasonsavard.com for more info.

Changelog: https://jasonsavard.com/wiki/Webmail_Ad_Blocker_changelog
long.zh_CN:
移除广告和赞助链接和挤出空空间留给其他广告拦截后面给你更多空间来写下你的邮件。

也有选项隐藏您的网页上其他项目，使之更加禅。还具有突出的选项周末和你的谷歌日历的当前日期。

Click "Website" or visit jasonsavard.com for more info.
